items.title: How to Support Anti Book Censorship Work Through Holiday Giving: Book Censorship News, December 5, 2025
items.description: In addition to gifting a banned book, what can you do to help someone get excited and engaged in the fight for the freedom to read?

items.title: Write On: Must-Read 2025 Author Biographies
